summary: Tries to remedy the overwhelmingly broken crafting system by completely removing all fortfiy effects for Alchemy Enchanting and Smithing, Updated for Dawnguard!
descriptionHtml:
[COLOR=#00BFFF]This mod was made in an attempt to balance skyrim, it changes the enchanting, smithing, and alchemy systems to make crafting loops impossible, It may seem like an extreme way to deal with these issues, but i find the results to work very well.

For best results use it with my other mods, i have provided links for easy access.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=Arial Black]This mod will be part of a series of mods to change many of Skyrims balance flaws, the other parts to go with this mod are.[/FONT][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#82CAFA][FONT=Arial Black]Artifact Balance Mod[/FONT][/COLOR] [SIZE=5][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21779/]Here[/URL][/SIZE]
[COLOR=#82CAFA][FONT=Arial Black]Combat Balance Mod[/FONT][/COLOR] [SIZE=5][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28831/]Here[/URL][/SIZE]

[COLOR=#ff0000][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]ISSUES: NOT COMPATIBLE WITH VANILLA! DG Required, will not work with other mods that change values of the items edited by this mod, for best results use on new saves[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE]

[COLOR=#fac08f][FONT=Arial Black]List of changes and effects.[/FONT][/COLOR]

Enchantments that grant fortify to Alchemy, Smithing, and Enchanting removed.

Ingredients adjusted to no longer include fortify effects for crafting skills.

Potions that grant fortify to crafting skills have all been removed.

Removed fortify effects from the following items Krosis, Muiri\'s Ring, and Silver-blood family ring
author: Ophelieseize
